_comment: This file is generated, do not change! Last generated on Tue Sep 29 2020 16:31:08 GMT+0000 (Coordinated Universal Time). To regenerate run 'make generate-specs'

specs.title: Check if Azure AKS Managed Kubernetes
specs.description: Verify that the Kubernetes cluster is a managed Azure AKS Cluster
specs.preflightSpecYaml:
apiVersion: troubleshoot.sh/v1beta2
kind: Preflight
metadata:
  name: cluster-is-aks
spec:
  collectors: []
  analyzers:
    - distribution:
        outcomes:
          - pass:
              when: == aks
              message: Azure AKS is a supported distribution
          - warn:
              message: The cluster is not running on Azure AKS
specs.supportSpecYaml:
apiVersion: troubleshoot.sh/v1beta2
kind: SupportBundle
metadata:
  name: cluster-is-aks
spec:
  collectors: []
  analyzers:
    - distribution:
        outcomes:
          - pass:
              when: == aks
              message: Azure AKS is a supported distribution
          - warn:
              message: The cluster is not running on Azure AKS

specs.title: Ensure that the cluster is not OpenShift
specs.description: Verify that the Kubernetes cluster is not OpenShift
specs.preflightSpecYaml:
apiVersion: troubleshoot.sh/v1beta2
kind: Preflight
metadata:
  name: cluster-is-not-openshift
spec:
  collectors: []
  analyzers:
    - distribution:
        outcomes:
          - fail:
              when: == openshift
              message: OpenShift is not supported
          - pass:
              message: The cluster is not OpenShift
specs.supportSpecYaml:

  analyzers:
    - distribution:
        outcomes:
          - fail:
              when: == openshift
              message: OpenShift is not supported
          - pass:
              message: The cluster is not OpenShift

specs.title: Check the version of Kubernetes
specs.preflightSpecYaml:
apiVersion: troubleshoot.sh/v1beta2
kind: Preflight
metadata:
  name: kubernetes-version
spec:
  collectors: []
  analyzers:
    - clusterVersion:
        outcomes:
          - fail:
              when: < 1.16.0
              message: >-
                The application requires at Kubernetes 1.16.0 or later, and
                recommends 1.18.0.
              uri: 'https://kubernetes.io'
          - warn:
              when: < 1.18.0
              message: >-
                Your cluster meets the minimum version of Kubernetes, but we
                recommend you update to 1.18.0 or later.
              uri: 'https://kubernetes.io'
          - pass:
              message: >-
                Your cluster meets the recommended and required versions of
                Kubernetes.
specs.supportSpecYaml:
apiVersion: troubleshoot.sh/v1beta2
kind: SupportBundle
metadata:
  name: kubernetes-version
spec:
  collectors: []
  analyzers:
    - clusterVersion:
        outcomes:
          - fail:
              when: < 1.16.0
              message: >-
                The application requires at Kubernetes 1.16.0 or later, and
                recommends 1.18.0.
              uri: 'https://kubernetes.io'
          - warn:
              when: < 1.18.0
              message: >-
                Your cluster meets the minimum version of Kubernetes, but we
                recommend you update to 1.18.0 or later.
              uri: 'https://kubernetes.io'
          - pass:
              message: >-
                Your cluster meets the recommended and required versions of
                Kubernetes.

specs.title: Minimum Node Count
specs.description: Require that there are at least 3 nodes, recommend at least 6 nodes in the cluster
specs.preflightSpecYaml:
apiVersion: troubleshoot.sh/v1beta2
kind: Preflight
metadata:
  name: minimum-node-count
spec:
  collectors: []
  analyzers:
    - nodeResources:
        checkName: Must have at least 3 nodes in the cluster
        outcomes:
          - fail:
              when: count() < 3
              message: This application requires at least 3 nodes
          - warn:
              when: count() < 6
              message: This application recommends at last 6 nodes.
          - pass:
              message: This cluster has enough nodes.
specs.supportSpecYaml:
apiVersion: troubleshoot.sh/v1beta2
kind: SupportBundle
metadata:
  name: minimum-node-count
spec:
  collectors: []
  analyzers:
    - nodeResources:
        checkName: Must have at least 3 nodes in the cluster
        outcomes:
          - fail:
              when: count() < 3
              message: This application requires at least 3 nodes
          - warn:
              when: count() < 6
              message: This application recommends at last 6 nodes.
          - pass:
              message: This cluster has enough nodes.

specs.title: MySQL Version Check
specs.description: Verify that a MySQL server is running a compatible version
specs.preflightSpecYaml:
apiVersion: troubleshoot.sh/v1beta2
kind: Preflight
metadata:
  name: supported-mysql-version
spec:
  collectors:
    - mysql:
        collectorName: mysql
        uri: 'testuser:password@tcp(mysql:3306)/dbname?tls=false'
  analyzers:
    - mysql:
        checkName: Must be MySQL 8.x or later
        collectorName: mysql
        outcomes:
          - fail:
              when: connected == false
              message: Cannot connect to MySQL server
          - fail:
              when: version < 8.x
              message: The MySQL server must be at least version 8
          - pass:
              message: The MySQL server is ready
specs.supportSpecYaml:
apiVersion: troubleshoot.sh/v1beta2
kind: SupportBundle
metadata:
  name: supported-mysql-version
spec:
  collectors:
    - mysql:
        collectorName: mysql
        uri: 'testuser:password@tcp(mysql:3306)/dbname?tls=false'
  analyzers:
    - mysql:
        checkName: Must be MySQL 8.x or later
        collectorName: mysql
        outcomes:
          - fail:
              when: connected == false
              message: Cannot connect to MySQL server
          - fail:
              when: version < 8.x
              message: The MySQL server must be at least version 8
          - pass:
              message: The MySQL server is ready

specs.title: PostgreSQL Version Check
specs.description: Verify that a PostgreSQL server is running a compatible version
specs.preflightSpecYaml:
apiVersion: troubleshoot.sh/v1beta2
kind: Preflight
metadata:
  name: supported-postgres-version
spec:
  collectors:
    - postgres:
        collectorName: postgresql
        uri: 'postgresql://user:password@hostname:5432/dbname?sslmode=require'
  analyzers:
    - postgres:
        checkName: Must be PostgreSQL 10.x or later
        collectorName: postgresql
        outcomes:
          - fail:
              when: connected == false
              message: Cannot connect to PostgreSQL server
          - fail:
              when: version < 10.x
              message: The PostgreSQL server must be at least version 10
          - pass:
              message: The PostgreSQL server is ready
specs.supportSpecYaml:
apiVersion: troubleshoot.sh/v1beta2
kind: SupportBundle
metadata:
  name: supported-postgres-version
spec:
  collectors:
    - postgres:
        collectorName: postgresql
        uri: 'postgresql://user:password@hostname:5432/dbname?sslmode=require'
  analyzers:
    - postgres:
        checkName: Must be PostgreSQL 10.x or later
        collectorName: postgresql
        outcomes:
          - fail:
              when: connected == false
              message: Cannot connect to PostgreSQL server
          - fail:
              when: version < 10.x
              message: The PostgreSQL server must be at least version 10
          - pass:
              message: The PostgreSQL server is ready

specs.title: Redis Version Check
specs.description: Verify that a Redis cluster is running a compatible version
specs.preflightSpecYaml:
apiVersion: troubleshoot.sh/v1beta2
kind: Preflight
metadata:
  name: supported-redis-version
spec:
  collectors:
    - redis:
        collectorName: redis
        uri: 'rediss://default:password@hostname:6379'
  analyzers:
    - redis:
        checkName: Must be redis 5.x or later
        collectorName: redis
        outcomes:
          - fail:
              when: connected == false
              message: Cannot connect to redis server
          - fail:
              when: version < 5.0.0
              message: The redis server must be at least version 5
          - pass:
              message: The redis connection checks out
specs.supportSpecYaml:
apiVersion: troubleshoot.sh/v1beta2
kind: SupportBundle
metadata:
  name: supported-redis-version
spec:
  collectors:
    - redis:
        collectorName: redis
        uri: 'rediss://default:password@hostname:6379'
  analyzers:
    - redis:
        checkName: Must be redis 5.x or later
        collectorName: redis
        outcomes:
          - fail:
              when: connected == false
              message: Cannot connect to redis server
          - fail:
              when: version < 5.0.0
              message: The redis server must be at least version 5
          - pass:
              message: The redis connection checks out
